Tool

NameMultiple Linear Regression Analysis
ID12
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2012

Description

Multiple linear regression analysis using ordinary least squares.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Table Table (input)TABLE
Output
Results (*)Table (optional output)RESULTS
Details: Coefficients (*)Table (optional output)INFO_COEFF
Details: Model (*)Table (optional output)INFO_MODEL
Details: Steps (*)Table (optional output)INFO_STEPS
Options
Dependent VariableTable fieldDEPENDENT
PredictorsParametersPREDICTORS0 Parameters:
MethodChoiceMETHODAvailable Choices: [0] include all [1] forward [2] backward [3] stepwise Default: 3
Significance LevelFloating pointP_VALUESignificance level (aka p-value) as threshold for automated predictor selection, given as percentageMinimum: 0.000000 Maximum: 100.000000 Default: 5.000000
Cross ValidationChoiceCROSSVALAvailable Choices: [0] none [1] leave one out [2] 2-fold [3] k-fold Default: 0
Cross Validation SubsamplesIntegerCROSSVAL_Knumber of subsamples for k-fold cross validationMinimum: 2 Default: 10
(*) optional
